channel.title: integration on Dynamics 365 Finance Operations & Power Platform
channel.description: Recent content in integration on Dynamics 365 Finance Operations & Power Platform

item.title: All about Odata actions in Dynamics 365 Finance And Operations
item.description: ODATA actions in Data Entities provide a way to inject behaviors into the data model, or expose custom business logic from Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations. You can add actions by adding a method to the data entity and then decorating the method with specific attributes [SysODataActionAttribute] I use this Odata actions mostly in automation job like after refreshing data from PROD to UAT, we need to enable users, assign company to users, enable batches … Or simply consume it in Power Automate.
